title: Super Bowl Stage Is Set
description:
Laura, Dan, Mina, RC, and Marcus break down everything that occurred during NFL Championship week, an overview of the retirement of Tom Brady, and conference title game edition of Big Man Ballin'.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
